name: The Elastic Orb
description:
A Jam Game created in 15 hours for the GDL September Jam, the theme was AI.



How To Play Dont let anything touch the button on your back Hit the enemies button to win Oh and theres a ball flying around And the walls move Careful
Get Ranked! First two games will determine your rank After, games are not weighted as much
Controls WASD


Created by: @PatSeeley7
